replies.body: Opinions
replies.body_tagged: Opinions

replies.body:
I started going on Ts, talked to Budah. Didn't know him before that, rarely saw him ingame lol, since he was always on Nexus. We killfarmed a lot and played avicus loads back then, it was at its golden age, with prestiges and a motive to play.

Pizza made the team, I didn't know him too much but I got in through raging/Budah. This was when it was called the game changers and before scrim servers on avicus, my first scrim was against Allah on SSB lol.

I honestly think you're a nice guy, I can't imagine you being a dick to anyone, despite how they treat you.
replies.body_tagged:
I started going on Ts, talked to Budah. Didn't know him before that, rarely saw him ingame lol, since he was always on Nexus. We killfarmed a lot and played avicus loads back then, it was at its golden age, with prestiges and a motive to play.

Pizza made the team, I didn't know him too much but I got in through raging/Budah. This was when it was called the game changers and before scrim servers on avicus, my first scrim was against Allah on SSB lol.

I honestly think you're a nice guy, I can't imagine you being a dick to anyone, despite how they treat you.

replies.body:
Great friend who got me through some dilemma's I had. We could easily be good friends irl, you humor is on point and I like that you don't look like a dumb person to me. You are a great player also, who cares though? We ain't gonna be playing Minecraft anymore and it isn't ''special'' to be rated good by anyone in Minecraft.

Something with chocolate or lemon ice cream.

Fucking hell, fav cake flavor? I'm not some kind of 5 year old, lol.

Fav traditional food: either a patatje speciaal or boerenkool.

replies.body: Same here, this year then i'm done. I am enjoying life and you're right it has been a while since we've last talked. Good luck with your studies doing BIM btw :)

Importance of tactical knowledge and playing clever vs importance of raw pvp in competitive moonman
what makes you still play AV?
will you win next tourney if not who will?
List of AV legends: (include me or else)

replies.body: Opinions? c:
replies.body_tagged: Opinions? c:

replies.body:
Playing clever will always be more important than pvp, you don't win games by being better at pvp, sure, it helps, but nothing stops you from beating a good pvp team with teamwork and good strats.

I don't play as much as I used to, probably my friends keep me here.

we'll play but the majority of my team gave up with avicus so we won't do as well as before since we just aren't as dedicated.

Best players throughout the whole competitive scene here: robo, you, Tazz, robin, me, remy, Eric, Budah, LG, loo, raging, probably forgetting loads lol
